pkgmetadata.longdescription: Two-Sample Tests for Equality of Means in High Dimension // Performs the generalized component test from Gregory et al (2015), as well as the tests from Chen and Qin (2010), Srivastava and Kubokawa (2013), and Cai, Liu, and Xia (2014) for equality of two population mean vectors when the length of the vectors exceeds the sample size.
